[Classes uses for the smearing method to fit the Z lineshape with PDF given by the MC]

 Given the ntuple (with all friends already added), returns a regions_cache_t.

Detailed Description

This class provides the method to import events from ntuples into memory as vector of ZeeEvent. The smearing method runs over such ZeeEvents stored in memory

Parameters:
regionList vector of strings with the name of the regions (corresponding to the syntax defined in ElectronCategory_class
